PAYMENT_FOR_OTHERS_REQUEST.title: Payment Request
PAYMENT_FOR_OTHERS_REQUEST.body: Payment request sent on behalf of someone else

PAYMENT_FOR_OTHERS_REJECTED.title: Payment Request Rejected
PAYMENT_FOR_OTHERS_REJECTED.body: Payment request for others has been rejected

POINTS_EARNED.title: Points Earned
POINTS_EARNED.body: You have earned new points in your account

REFERRAL_REWARD.title: Referral Reward
REFERRAL_REWARD.body: You have received a reward for referring a friend

ORDER_APPROVED.title: The Order Has Been Approved
ORDER_APPROVED.body: The order has been approved and is now awaiting payment.

PENDING_APPROVAL.title: Order Update
PENDING_APPROVAL.body: The order is awaiting review and approval.

POINTS_MANUALLY_ADDED.title: Points Added!
POINTS_MANUALLY_ADDED.body: An administrator has added new points to your account.

ORDER_CANCELED.title: Order Canceled
ORDER_CANCELED.body: Your order has been successfully canceled.

ORDER_REOPENED.title: Order Reopened
ORDER_REOPENED.body: A previously closed or canceled order has been reopened.

NEW_SUPPORT_TICKET.title: New Support Ticket
NEW_SUPPORT_TICKET.body: A new support ticket has been created by a user.

SUPPORT_TICKET_ESCALATED.title: Ticket Escalated
SUPPORT_TICKET_ESCALATED.body: Your ticket has been escalated to a higher support team.

NEW_ESCALATED_SUPPORT_TICKET.title: New Escalated Ticket
NEW_ESCALATED_SUPPORT_TICKET.body: A new escalated support ticket has been assigned to you.

SUPPORT_TICKET_RESOLVED.title: Support Ticket Resolved
SUPPORT_TICKET_RESOLVED.body: Your support ticket has been resolved and is now closed.

SUPPORT_TICKET_MESSAGE.title: New Message on Your Support Ticket
SUPPORT_TICKET_MESSAGE.body: There's a new message on your support ticket. Check it out to see the update.

NEW_MESSAGE_ON_SUPPORT_TICKET.title: New Message on Support Ticket
NEW_MESSAGE_ON_SUPPORT_TICKET.body: A new message has been sent on your support ticket.
